title: US-Israel strikes mark latest chapter in Iran conflict
summary_full: The US and Israel launched airstrikes on Tehran on Saturday, targeting senior regime figures, command centers and key elements of Iran’s air defenses
summary_public: The US and Israel launched airstrikes on Tehran on Saturday, targeting senior regime figures, command centers and key elements of Iran’s air defenses
